newsitem.title: FRANCE: German climber missing on Mont Blanc.
newsitem.headline: German climber missing on Mont Blanc.

text.p: A German climber was missing after falling in poor weather on Mont Blanc, Europe's highest mountain, rescuers said on Wednesday.
They said his brother was rescued unhurt.
The unnamed climber fell on Tuesday while climbing towards a refuge on the 3,700-metre (12,140-ft) Aiguille du Gouter, on the easy route to the top of 4,807-metre (15,770-ft) Mont Blanc.
Poor weather halted search operations early on Wednesday.
